SELECT months.month AS month, IFNULL(join_counts.join_count, 0) AS joinCount FROM ( SELECT 1 AS month UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 UNION ALL SELECT 10 UNION ALL SELECT 11 UNION ALL SELECT 12 ) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONTH(m_joindate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS join_count FROM member GROUP BY month ) AS join_counts ON months.month = join_counts.month ORDER BY months.month
